name: Bob: Saving Bobbett
description:
Yolki has kidnapped Bobbett bobs lover, you will go on a challenging journey to save Bobbett from Yolki and the creatures that he has taken control over. The journey will not be easy but Bob must save Bobbett before Yolki ends her life. You will have some help from the God Of Power but if you fail he will be very unforgiving and make your journey more difficult.

  • Challenging game play
  • Strategic at its best
  • Variety of attacks
  • Unique environments to explore
  • Fun

Put your skills to the test and fight against the creatures populating the world, fight against your arch nemesis Yolki while fighting time itself.

The God of Power will make your journey successful or a living nightmare, this god will save you, grant you powers and even reverse time, in return you need the coin, collect keys and Monster points.
